title: MapContext.moveToLocation
content:
# MapContext.moveToLocation

2022-07-03 18:44

Display the pinned location at the center of the map and restore the default zoom level. Use this API together with the `show-location` method of the [map component](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_map_map).

## Sample code

copy

```javascript
this.mapCtx = my.createMapContext('map');
this.mapCtx.moveToLocation();
```
